text:
Most people search with ChatGPT. 

But ChatGPT is not the best for search. 

There are better AI search engines (October 2025). 

Here’s what you need to know: 

1 - Perplexity 
Fast, clear, and always gives sources. 
Best for research and up-to-date info. 

2 - Grok 
Made by xAI. Has access to Twitter (X) data. 
Great for trending topics and real-time news. 

3 - DeepSeek 
Strong at technical & academic searches. 
Impressive for code and math. 

4 - Claude (Sonnet 4.5)
Good for summaries and long answers. 
Handles context better than most. 

5 - Gemini 
Best for visual tasks and Google data.
Edits images, understands context.

6 - Kimi 
China’s least biased AI. Good for sensitive topics. 
Gives balanced, neutral answers.

7 - ChatGPT 
Still strong for creative writing & brainstorming. 
Not the best for live search. Lacks real-time data. 

tl;dr: Perplexity is the best AI for search.

I wrote a (free) blog on How to search with AI.

Don't miss it at https://lnkd.in/gPD53iDj.
